Calculator Design 1

Welcome to my second ever JavaScript Project. I always liked the idea of making a calculator and practising JavaScript gave me the perfect oppurtunity to do so. I went for a slightly different approach to most JavaScript calculators in that it uses two text boxes to input numbers and then a series on buttons each indicating a operation of the calculator. Once the information is input and a button clicked the calculation is then output into a table which stores all previous calculations. I will be making another calculator soon in the traditional way but this was an interesting project since no one had do it like this before.
